title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.17 - Hunting and firearms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.17 - Hunting and firearms

State Regulations

No person shall hunt or discharge a firearm in, on, at or
upon any transportation facility at any time, except that a law enforcement
officer may discharge a firearm but only if necessary in the execution of his
official duties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1151.17

Amended, New

York State Register May 14, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 19, eff. 5/14/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
